A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Never reviewed a movie until now. This movie pushed me to the point were i had to review & say my bit. Horrible\, so disappointing. I wish all involved would just admit they got it wrong\, instead of trying to defend this movie. So many upsetting moments throughout the story\, I could of probaly excepted it\, even princess Leia doing her super man with no questions asked\, but what they did with Luke's character\, absolutely shattering. Can't see myself making any effort to see another star wars flick\, yes that's how bad this was.o
